channel.title: Technology on Lawman vs Layman

item.title: Understanding Blockchain Technology
item.description: What Is Blockchain? Think of blockchain as a digital ledger book that’s shared among many people. Instead of one person or company controlling this book, thousands of computers around the world each have an identical copy. When someone wants to add a new entry (like a transaction), all these computers must agree it’s valid before it gets added. Once something is written in this book, it’s extremely difficult to change or erase.
